Didier Florent Ouénangaré (1953 - 2006) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si Central African Republic, nke a maara nke ọma maka mmekọrịta ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Cameroon bụ Bassek Ba Kobhio na The Silence of the Forest, nke e wetara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Étienne Goyémidé.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị maka ihe nkiri na Abidjan na Ivory Coast, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rennes.
Silence of the Forest bụ ọrụ nke Ouénangaré chepụtara, onye gakwuuru Bassek Ba Kobhio iji nyere aka chọta ego. E dere ya na French na Sango, ma mee ya na Central African Republic na Gabon

Ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere Gonaba, onye Afrịka gụrụ akwụkwọ na Europe, onye kpebiri ịlaghachi n'ala nna ya, mana ọ na-aghọtawanye na ọ gaghị ekwe omume ịpụ n'etiti echiche na ịghọta ụzọ ndụ nke ndị Baka, 'ndị ọhịa' bụ ndị ọ na-akpọ 'pygmies'.
